wblut.geom

Class WB_NurbsKnot

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.geom.WB_NurbsKnot

  • public class WB_NurbsKnot
extends java.lang.Object
    Normalized BSpline knot vector.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte, W:Blut

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WB_NurbsKnot(int degree, double[] val)
      Instantiates a new w b_ nurbs knot.
      WB_NurbsKnot(int ncp, int degree)
      Instantiates a uniform, clamped knot vector for the given number of control points and curve degree.
      WB_NurbsKnot(int ncp, int degree, double[] val)
      Instantiates a non-uniform, clamped knot vector for the given number of control points and curve degree.
      WB_NurbsKnot(WB_NurbsKnot knot)
      Instantiates a copy of the given knot.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WB_NurbsKnot

        public WB_NurbsKnot(int ncp,
            int degree)
        Instantiates a uniform, clamped knot vector for the given number of control points and curve degree.
        Parameters:
        ncp - number of control points
        degree - degree of curve

      • WB_NurbsKnot

        public WB_NurbsKnot(int ncp,
            int degree,
            double[] val)
        Instantiates a non-uniform, clamped knot vector for the given number of control points and curve degree.
        Parameters:
        ncp - number of control points
        degree - degree of curve
        val - non-clamped values of knot, should be non-decreasing and of size ncp-degree-1

      • WB_NurbsKnot

            double[] val)
        Instantiates a new w b_ nurbs knot.
        Parameters:
        degree - the degree
        val - the val
